properties.entry: SELECT POINT FROM POINT WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT PH.POINT_PATH , PH.GU_DATE , PH.POINT , ph.GETUSE_TYPE_GU FROM POINT_HISTORY PH JOIN POINT P ON(P.POINT_NO = PH.POINT_NO) WHERE P.USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COUPON WHERE COUPON_USE_YN = 'N' AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUPON_NAME , COUPON_DISCOUNT , COUPON_CONDITION , COUPON_START , COUPON_END FROM COUPON WHERE COUPON_USE_YN = 'N' AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT USER_NICKNAME , USER_PHONE , REPORT_COUNT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_NICKNAME = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PHONE = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_WITHDRAW_YN = 'Y' , WITHDRAWDATE = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT R.REPORT_NO , R.REPORT_TITLE , A.ACCOMO_NAME , R.REPORT_DATE , R.REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT R JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(A.ACCOMO_NO = R.REPORTED_NO) WHERE R.WRITER_TYPE = 'guest' AND R.MEMBER_NO = ? AND R.REPORTED_TYPE = 'owner'
